Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

extract, Rosmarinus officinalis leaf extract, Chamomilla recutita flower extract, Sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed glycosaminoglycans, Sodium hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed hyaluronic acid, Hyaluronic acid, Sclerotium gum, Pentylene glycol, Madecassoside, Tamarindus indica seed polysaccharide
